title: Mother’s Day
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>Ehehehe~, Kasumin is finished with the letter for mother’s day!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Mother’s day…. Huh. Fuh, it’s great that the world of man can have such a peaceful event…. There’s no such thing in the world of demons<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>What are you giving on mother’s day, Yoshiko-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Did you not listen to me? I said that the world of demons doesn’t have such an occasion. Also, it’s Yohane, okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Yoshiko-chan needs to answer Kasumin’s question too. If you don’t, Kasumin will tell Kanan-senpai that “Yoshiko-chan wants to do the hell triathlon again”, so<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Hah!? Why are you bringing that up! If I have to do that again, I’ll make sure to use all of my magical powers to drag you with me<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>N-, n-, n-, no way!! This conversation never happened! Never ever! Let’s go back to mother’s day!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Like I said, a fallen angel doesn’t have the time for such a carefree day<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Eeh~, you can stop with that, you know. Did you not prepare something like a present or a letter?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>….flowers<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>I bought flowers, okay! I’m giving it to her!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
